name: 郭政淳
objective: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
schedule:
Wk1    Course Introduction
Wk2    Paragraph Structure
Wk3    Unity and Coherence
Wk4    Using Outside Resources/Library Visit
Wk5    Holiday-No Class
Wk6    From Paragraph to Essay
Wk7    Summary, Paraphrase, Plagiarism    
Wk8    Process Essays (I)
Wk9    Process Essays (II)
Wk10    Comparison/Contrast Essays (I)
Wk11    Comparison/Contrast Essays (II)
Wk12    Cause/Effect Essays (I)
Wk13    Cause/Effect Essays (II)
Wk14    Argumentative Essays (I)
Wk15    Argumentative Essays (II)
Wk16    Writing Emails 
Wk17    Final Consultation
Wk18    Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homework: 25%
Participation: 15%  
Quizzes: 20%  
Final Exam: 20%  
Class Project: 20%
materials: Oshima, A., & Hogue, A. 2014. Longman Academic Writing Series: Essays (5th ed.). New York: Pearson Education.
